doc.field: Shr loss 30 cts vs profit 12 cts Net loss 2,374,000 vs profit 970,000 Revs 15.7 mln vs 13.4 mln Year Shr loss 13 cts vs profit 46 cts Net loss 1,054,000 vs profit 3,425,000 Revs 61.8 mln vs 49.9 mln Note: Full name Safeguard Health Enterprises Inc.
